mapper.select: select count(*) /* MPAUserMapper.selectUserListCnt */ from (select mem.mem_seq , mem.id , mem.name , mem.hp_no , mem.email , mem.reg_dtm , mem.mod_dtm , mem.mem_cd , mem.work_bsnm_no , mem.gndr , case when mst.mod_cd ='AD' then (select name from co_adm_mst where id=mst.reg_id) when mst.mod_cd = 'CO' then (select name FROM co_mem_mst where id=mst.reg_id) else null end as mod_name , cmpn_mst.cmpn_nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=cmpn_mst.size_cd ) as size_cd_nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=cmpn_mst.ctgry_cd ) as ctgry_cd_nm , cmpn_mst.ctgry_cd , mem.tel_no , mem.zipcode , mem.bsc_addr , mem.dtl_addr , mem.cmssr_type_cd , case when mem.cmssr_type_cd != '' then (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=mem.cmssr_type_cd ) else '' end as cmssr_type_cd_nm , mem.cmssr_cbsn_cd , case when mem.cmssr_cbsn_cd != '' then (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=mem.cmssr_cbsn_cd ) else '' end as cmssr_cbsn_cd_nm , mem.cmssr_work_cd , case when mem.cmssr_work_cd != '' then (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=mem.cmssr_work_cd ) else '' end as cmssr_work_cd_nm , case when (select count(*) from co_adm_mst where id=mem.reg_id) > 0 then (select name from co_adm_mst where id=mem.reg_id) when (select count(*) from co_adm_mst where id=mem.reg_id) = 0 then (select name FROM co_mem_mst where id=mem.reg_id) else null end as cmt_mod_name , mem.birth , mem.cmssr_mplmn_dt , mem.cmssr_rsgnt_dt , mem.wthdrw_yn from co_mem_mst mem inner join ( select mem_mod_seq , mem_seq , mod_cd , reg_id from co_mem_mod_log where ( mem_mod_seq , mem_seq) in ( select max(mem_mod_seq) , mem_seq from co_mem_mod_log group by mem_seq ) ) mst on mem.mem_seq = mst.mem_seq left outer join co_mem_cmpn_rel cmpn_rel on mem.mem_seq = cmpn_rel.mem_seq and mem.work_bsnm_no = cmpn_rel.bsnm_no left outer join cp_cmpn_mst cmpn_mst on mem.work_bsnm_no =cmpn_mst.bsnm_no ) as ma

select mem.mem_seq /* MPAUserMapper.selectUserDtl */ , mem.id , mem.name , mem.hp_no , mem.email , mem.reg_dtm , mem.mod_dtm , mem.last_lgn_dtm , mem.mem_cd , mem.wthdrw_yn , case when mem.cmssr_type_cd != '' then (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=mem.cmssr_type_cd ) else '' end as cmssr_type_cd_nm , case when mem.cmssr_cbsn_cd != '' then (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=mem.cmssr_cbsn_cd ) else '' end as cmssr_cbsn_cd_nm , case when mem.cmssr_work_cd != '' then (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=mem.cmssr_work_cd ) else '' end as cmssr_work_cd_nm , cmpn_mst.cmpn_nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=cmpn_mst.ctgry_cd ) as ctgry_cd_nm , case when mst.mod_cd ='AD' then (select name from co_adm_mst where id=mst.reg_id) when mst.mod_cd = 'CO' then (select name FROM co_mem_mst where id=mst.reg_id) else null end as mod_name from co_mem_mst mem inner join ( select mem_mod_seq , mem_seq , mod_cd , reg_id from co_mem_mod_log where ( mem_mod_seq , mem_seq) in ( select max(mem_mod_seq) , mem_seq from co_mem_mod_log group by mem_seq ) ) mst on mem.mem_seq = mst.mem_seq left outer join co_mem_cmpn_rel cmpn_rel on mem.mem_seq = cmpn_rel.mem_seq and mem.work_bsnm_no = cmpn_rel.bsnm_no left outer join cp_cmpn_mst cmpn_mst ON mem.work_bsnm_no = cmpn_mst.bsnm_no -- on cmpn_mst.bsnm_no = cmpn_rel.bsnm_no where mem.mem_seq = #{detailsKey}

select mem.mem_seq /* MPAUserMapper.selectUserDtlTab */ , mem.id , mem.name , mem.zipcode , mem.bsc_addr , mem.dtl_addr , mem.tel_no , mem.hp_no , mem.email , mem.birth , mem.gndr , mem.mod_dtm , mem.ntfy_sms_rcv_chng_dtm , mem.ntfy_sms_rcv_yn , mem.ntfy_email_rcv_chng_dtm , mem.ntfy_email_rcv_yn , mem.mem_cd , mem.cmssr_type_cd , mem.cmssr_cbsn_cd , mem.cmssr_work_cd , mem.cmssr_mplmn_dt , mem.cmssr_rsgnt_dt , mem.cmssr_photo_file_seq , mem.cmssr_mjr_carer_cntn , mem.cmssr_cnstg_fld_cntn , mem.cmssr_mjr_carer_exps_yn , mem.work_bsnm_no , cmpn_mst.cmpn_nm , cmpn_mst.ctgry_cd , cmpn_mst.zipcode as cmpn_zipcode , cmpn_mst.bsc_addr as cmpn_bsc_addr , cmpn_mst.dtl_addr as cmpn_dtl_addr , cmpn_mst.rprsnt_nm as rprsntNm , mem.dept_cd , mem.dept_dtl_nm , mem.pstn_cd , mem.reg_dtm , case when cmpn_mst.ctgry_cd != '' then (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=cmpn_mst.ctgry_cd ) else '' end as ctgry_cd_nm , case when (select count(*) from co_adm_mst where id=mem.reg_id) > 0 then (select name from co_adm_mst where id=mem.reg_id) when (select count(*) from co_adm_mst where id=mem.reg_id) = 0 then (select name FROM co_mem_mst where id=mem.reg_id) else null end as reg_name , case when mst.mod_cd ='AD' then (select name from co_adm_mst where id=mst.reg_id) when mst.mod_cd = 'CO' then (select name FROM co_mem_mst where id=mst.reg_id) else null end as mod_name , mst.reg_id as mod_id , mem.reg_id as reg_id , mem.pstn_nm , dtl.ci , dtl.fndn_ntfy_rcv_yn from co_mem_mst mem inner join ( select mem_mod_seq , mem_seq , mod_cd , reg_id from co_mem_mod_log where ( mem_mod_seq , mem_seq) in ( select max(mem_mod_seq) , mem_seq from co_mem_mod_log group by mem_seq ) ) mst on mem.mem_seq = mst.mem_seq inner join co_mem_dtl dtl on mem.mem_seq = dtl.mem_seq left outer join co_mem_cmpn_rel cmpn_rel on mem.mem_seq = cmpn_rel.mem_seq and mem.work_bsnm_no = cmpn_rel.bsnm_no left outer join cp_cmpn_mst cmpn_mst ON mem.work_bsnm_no = cmpn_mst.bsnm_no -- on cmpn_mst.bsnm_no = cmpn_rel.bsnm_no where mem.mem_seq = #{detailsKey}
mapper.insert: insert into co_mem_mod_log /* MPAUserMapper.insertUserDtlHistory */ ( mem_mod_seq , mem_seq , mod_cd , bfre_zipcode , bfre_bsc_addr , bfre_dtl_addr , bfre_email , bfre_dept_cd , bfre_pstn_cd , bfre_tel_no , bfre_bsnm_reg_no , bfre_sms_rcv_yn , bfre_email_rcv_yn , reg_ip , reg_dtm , reg_id ) select #{modSeq} , mem_seq , #{modCd} , zipcode , bsc_addr , dtl_addr , email , dept_cd , pstn_cd , tel_no , work_bsnm_no , ntfy_sms_rcv_yn , ntfy_email_rcv_yn , #{regIp} , now() , #{regId} from co_mem_mst where id =#{id}
mapper.select: select appctn_mst.mem_seq /* MPAUserMapper.selectAttcntList */ , appctn_mst.reg_dtm , episd_mst.year , episd_mst.episd , rsume_dtl.appctn_stts_cd , rsume_dtl.mng_stts_cd , ( select name from cx_appctn_rsume_prize_car_dtl where rsume_seq = rsume_dtl.rsume_seq and rsume_ord = 1) as name , ( select ptcpt_type from cx_appctn_rsume_prize_car_dtl where rsume_seq = rsume_dtl.rsume_seq and rsume_ord = 1) as ptcpt_type , ( select theme_cd from cx_appctn_rsume_prize_car_dtl where rsume_seq = rsume_dtl.rsume_seq and rsume_ord = 1) as theme_cd , ( select wdcrm_cd from cx_appctn_rsume_prize_car_dtl where rsume_seq = rsume_dtl.rsume_seq and rsume_ord = 3) as wdcrm_cd , ( select appctn_stts_cd from cx_appctn_rsume_dtl where rsume_seq = rsume_dtl.rsume_seq and rsume_ord = 1) as seoryu_cd , ( select appctn_stts_cd from cx_appctn_rsume_dtl where rsume_seq = rsume_dtl.rsume_seq and rsume_ord = 2) as first_cd , ( select mng_stts_cd from cx_appctn_rsume_dtl where rsume_seq = rsume_dtl.rsume_seq and rsume_ord = 3) as end_cd from cx_appctn_mst appctn_mst inner join cx_episd_mst episd_mst on appctn_mst.episd_seq = episd_mst.episd_seq inner join cx_appctn_rsume_dtl rsume_dtl on appctn_mst.appctn_seq =rsume_dtl.appctn_seq where rsume_ord = 1 and appctn_mst.mem_seq=#{detailsKey} order by appctn_mst.appctn_seq desc limit #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

select count(*) from cx_appctn_mst appctn_mst /* MPAUserMapper.selectAttcntListCnt */ inner join cx_episd_mst episd_mst on appctn_mst.episd_seq = episd_mst.episd_seq inner join cx_appctn_rsume_dtl rsume_dtl on appctn_mst.appctn_seq =rsume_dtl.appctn_seq where rsume_ord = 1 and appctn_mst.mem_seq=#{detailsKey}

select qa_mst.qa_seq /* MPAUserMapper.selectInqrList */ , qa_mst.reg_dtm as start_inqr_dtm , qa_mst.titl , rply_dtl.reg_dtm as end_inqr_dtm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd_id='INQUIRY_TYPE' and cd=ctgry_dtl.parnt_ctgry_cd) as parnt_ctgry_cd_nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd_id='INQUIRY_TYPE' and cd=ctgry_dtl.ctgry_cd) as ctgry_cd_nm , case when qa_mst.init_chk_dtm is null then '접수대기' when qa_mst.init_chk_dtm is not null and rply_dtl.cntn is null then '접수완료' when qa_mst.init_chk_dtm is not null and rply_dtl.cntn is not null then '답변완료' else null end as inqr_stts from bd_qa_mst qa_mst inner join bd_qa_ctgry_dtl ctgry_dtl on qa_mst.qa_seq = ctgry_dtl.qa_seq left outer join bd_qa_rply_dtl rply_dtl on ctgry_dtl.qa_seq = rply_dtl.qa_seq where qa_mst.mem_seq =#{detailsKey} order by qa_mst.qa_seq desc limit #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

select count(*) /* MPAUserMapper.selectInqrListCnt */ from bd_qa_mst qa_mst inner join bd_qa_ctgry_dtl ctgry_dtl on qa_mst.qa_seq = ctgry_dtl.qa_seq left outer join bd_qa_rply_dtl rply_dtl on ctgry_dtl.qa_seq = rply_dtl.qa_seq where qa_mst.mem_seq =#{detailsKey}
SELECT /* MPAUserMapper.selectMemDtl */ email , mem_cd , name from co_mem_mst where id =#{id}
select count(*) /* MPAUserMapper.selectCiCnt */ from co_mem_mst a inner join co_mem_dtl b on a.mem_seq = b.mem_seq where 1=1 and b.ci = #{ci}
select count(*) /* MPAUserMapper.selectcmpnMst */ from cp_cmpn_mst where 1=1 and bsnm_no = #{bsnmNo}

select dtl.rsume_stts_cd /* MPAUserMapper.selectMPHPartList */ , dtl.rsume_seq , mem_seq from cx_appctn_mst mst inner join cx_appctn_rsume_dtl dtl on mst.appctn_seq = dtl.appctn_seq inner join cx_appctn_rsume_prize_part_dtl part_dtl on dtl.rsume_seq = part_dtl.rsume_seq and dtl.rsume_ord = part_dtl.rsume_ord
union select dtl.rsume_stts_cd , dtl.rsume_seq , mem_seq from cx_appctn_mst mst inner join cx_appctn_rsume_dtl dtl on mst.appctn_seq = dtl.appctn_seq inner join cx_appctn_rsume_task_dtl task_dtl on dtl.rsume_seq = task_dtl.rsume_seq and dtl.rsume_ord = task_dtl.rsume_ord
union select dtl.rsume_stts_cd , dtl.rsume_seq , mem_seq from cx_appctn_mst mst inner join cx_appctn_rsume_dtl dtl on mst.appctn_seq = dtl.appctn_seq inner join cx_appctn_rsume_pbsn_dtl pbsn_dtl on dtl.rsume_seq = pbsn_dtl.rsume_seq and dtl.rsume_ord = pbsn_dtl.rsume_ord
union select dtl.rsume_stts_cd , dtl.rsume_seq , mem_seq from cx_appctn_mst mst inner join cx_appctn_rsume_dtl dtl on mst.appctn_seq = dtl.appctn_seq inner join cx_appctn_rsume_tchlg_dtl tchlg_dtl on dtl.rsume_seq = tchlg_dtl.rsume_seq and dtl.rsume_ord = tchlg_dtl.rsume_ord

select count(*) /* MPAUserMapper.selectConListCnt */ from cp_cnstg_appctn_mst where appctn_mem_seq =#{memSeq} and rsume_stts_cd in ( 'MNGTECH_STATUS_01' , 'MNGTECH_STATUS_03' , 'MNGTECH_STATUS_06' , 'MNGTECH_STATUS_08' , 'MNGTECH_STATUS_09' )

select mem.mem_seq /* MPAUserMapper.selectUserDtl */ , mem.id , mem.name , mem.hp_no , mem.email , mem.reg_dtm , mem.mod_dtm , mem.last_lgn_dtm , mem.mem_cd , mem.wthdrw_yn , case when mem.cmssr_type_cd != '' then (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=mem.cmssr_type_cd ) else '' end as cmssr_type_cd_nm , case when mem.cmssr_cbsn_cd != '' then (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=mem.cmssr_cbsn_cd ) else '' end as cmssr_cbsn_cd_nm , case when mem.cmssr_work_cd != '' then (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=mem.cmssr_work_cd ) else '' end as cmssr_work_cd_nm , cmpn_mst.cmpn_nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=cmpn_mst.ctgry_cd ) as ctgry_cd_nm , case when mst.mod_cd ='AD' then (select name from co_adm_mst where id=mst.reg_id) when mst.mod_cd = 'CO' then (select name FROM co_mem_mst where id=mst.reg_id) else null end as mod_name from co_mem_mst mem inner join ( select mem_mod_seq , mem_seq , mod_cd , reg_id from co_mem_mod_log where ( mem_mod_seq , mem_seq) in ( select max(mem_mod_seq) , mem_seq from co_mem_mod_log group by mem_seq ) ) mst on mem.mem_seq = mst.mem_seq left outer join co_mem_cmpn_rel cmpn_rel on mem.mem_seq = cmpn_rel.mem_seq and mem.work_bsnm_no = cmpn_rel.bsnm_no left outer join cp_cmpn_mst cmpn_mst ON mem.work_bsnm_no = cmpn_mst.bsnm_no where mem.id = #{id}
